alert.note: Alert for Cole; Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 10:35PM CDT until July 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COLE AND SOUTHWESTERN OSAGE COUNTIES... At 1034 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Thomas, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Linn, Wardsville, Taos, Freeburg, Westphalia, St. Thomas, Rich Fountain, Meta, Schubert, Koeltztown, Osage City, Osage Bend, and Loose Creek. This also includes Clarks Hill/Norton Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
